```py
from django.conf.urls import url 
from toys import views 

urlpatterns = [ 
    url(r'^toys/$', views.toy_list), 
    url(r'^toys/(?P<pk>[0-9]+)$', views.toy_detail), 
] 
```

```py
from django.conf.urls import url, include 

urlpatterns = [ 
    url(r'^', include('toys.urls')), 
]
```
